original_text: While Paul was speaking God's message, this man listened to him. Paul looked at him carefully. He could see that the man believed in Jesus. The man believed that God could make him well.
korean_text: 바울이 말하는 것을 듣거늘 바울이 주목하여 구원 받을 만한 믿음이 그에게 있는 것을 보고

sentences.original_text: While Paul was speaking God's message
He could see that the man believed in Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 사람이 예수님을 믿고 있다는 것을 알 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: The man believed that God could make him well
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람은 하나님이 자신을 낫게 하실 수 있다고 믿었습니다
